<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sinister Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2556) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You possess horns, a tail, or red eyes, or could otherwise be mistaken for a [tiefling](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=26). You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7). If you would automatically become trained in Intimidation (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796) skill feat, as well as a +2 circumstance bonus on [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) when pretending to be a version of yourself who is a tiefling.
name: Sinister Appearance
